name: h3
description: The Chandler CB24 Maple Wood Bat is a proprietary model crafted for elite high school and collegiate players, specifically designed for power hitters making the transition to wood. Featuring a sharp taper at the transition and a medium flare leading to a comfortably thin handle, this bat offers a balanced swing feel that caters to both contact and power hitters. The CB24 is constructed with very dense and hard wood to maximize ball flight, while the large barrel provides an optimal hitting surface. With its grey colorway accented by red holo details, this bat not only performs exceptionally but also stands out visually. Ink Dot Certified for pro-grade durability, the full-cup design enhances weight distribution, making it a top choice for serious players.
